alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 3:12PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila County near Carrizo through 345 PM MST... At 311 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Carrizo to 10 miles southwest of Cedar Creek. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cedar Creek and Fort Apache Reservation. This includes the following highways... State Route 73 between mile markers 312 and 323. Highway 60 between mile markers 298 and 315. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
